channel.title: Nebraska on Reagen Schulenberg
channel.description: Recent content in Nebraska on Reagen Schulenberg

item.title: Which Big 10 softball team is the best in the 2021 season?
item.description: As someone who has grown up around the sport of softball, I’ve watched hundreds of games. My sister played softball in college and little did I know that years later I would be working for the University of Nebraska-Lincoln’s softball team. I joined the digital media team at the athletic department in October of 2019. Going into my second year, I noticed that I was invited to a softball meeting right before school started.

item.title: Is Lauren Stivrins having an All-American type of season?
item.description: The University of Nebraska-Lincoln’s volleyball team is known for being one of the best volleyball teams in the nation. They seem to be always ranked and have won five National Championships, most recently in 2015 and 2017. With UNL football’s seasons recently, some UNL students have referred to UNL as a “volleyball school”. When the Huskers play in Lincoln at the Bob Devaney Sports Center, the Huskers always have a full stadium and true fans cheering them on.
